text: well it's an absolute pleasure to meet
you Kate um we see you in Divergent in a
slightly different way from we've seen
you before you know it's action you're a
baddy uh did you enjoy playing a V and
how did you get into the the wicked mode
um I don't know how I got into the
wicked mode I think I was maybe helped
by the fact that the the character of
Janine that I play in in Divergent she's
very very well constructed in the book
and so for me in particular I just I
just sort of soaked up all of that um
but I loved it I loved being
intimidating I loved walking on set for
the first day and they'd already been
filming for 17 weeks and they were all
clearly a little bit a little bit
intimidated I think both by the Janine
part of it and perhaps that I had
suddenly turned up I don't know why I
seem to have this effect on people that
get really scared and so I just thought
oh I'll let them be scared I'm just
going to let them be scared so I let
them be scared for a few days and then
of course they realized I was the
biggest softy out of a lot of them and
uh yeah they were all crying on my
shoulder by week three so you didn't
give the wrinkling that you're actually
not a nasty person no no I know I didn't
for the first couple of days I really
just let them think that I was I was
horrible and was there to intimidate and
destroy it worked you were 5 months
pregnant while filming how was that it
was you know at the end of the day it
was probably just quite funny really you
know endless undergarments trying to
sort of smooth everything down and you
know it's it's it's difficult trying to
hide a pregnancy when the last thing in
the world that you want to be doing is
hiding it and so uh so now we just had
to keep tweaking costumes letting them
out a little more and a little more um
but apart from the swollen ankles it it
was fine I couldn't do as many stuns as
I'd wanted to do we did have a little
bit of re-shooting which actually only
happened about 6 weeks ago so having
just had the baby um I did find myself
back on set and I was actually able to
do a little bit of the stunty stuff
which which I always love so that was
that was great um now the film of course
is about making that choice that moment
in your life when you decide whether to
go with the way you raised or sort of
follow your your internal Compass um I
know it well uh that moment when you
kind of decideed you want to rebel a
little bit did you ever rebel I never
really had that rebellious moment I was
quite an independent teenager but also I
was working I started working when I was
about 15 16 and so I think when you're
out in the world you have to be
responsible and you have to sort of take
care of yourself so perhaps now actually
in playing a baddy in Divergent maybe
I'm finally rebelling maybe this is my
channeling my inner moment um but
I do think that uh one of the things
about the film that for me was so strong
when I first read the script is exactly
what you say is that you know you do
reach a point in your life where you
know you have to choose really make that
choice who are you going to be what kind
of person do you want to be for the rest
of your life and and actually being true
to yourself you know these are Big
questions and I think the fact that the
film does pose those big questions it
really does I think make you think um
and I love that uh will your kids be
watching Divergent they've seen it and
they loved it they really loved it and
they had lots of questions afterwards
really intelligent questions which I
liked um but it's very much a film I
think for that age range or they're the
sort of the young younger end of that
age range um but there's got a bit it's
got a bit of everything for everybody
just because you know there aren't just
these young teenage actors in it as well
it's got lots of really old cronies like
myself you're not an old crony just
finally are there any of your films that
they won't be watching what for whatever
reason oh most of them oh they can't see
most of my films I mean no no no no why
is that I I've for half the films I've
made I've ended up having to take my
clothes off so that would be the first
reason um but secondly they're just much
more I don't know they're just much more
sort of um adult oriented dramas I
suppose um I haven't done I haven't
really done any kids films as such um so
this is this is a bit of a first really
as as far as they're concerned because
it is something that they can go and see
